nodes.text: Dakar Sol was a slave in the service of the reconstituted Sith Empire who led fellow slaves in a rebellion on the planet Malachor V. By the time of the Cold War between the Sith Empire and the Galactic Republic, Sol's rebellion was considered to have been the largest of its kind in the history of the Empire.
Dakar Sol was first mentioned in the Codex entry for "Rebelling Slaves" in Star Wars: The Old Republic, a video game released by BioWare in 2011, though Sol's gender and species were not identified.
